text.text: In order to craft armor pieces, you'll need two new types of tinkering tables: the Armor Station and the Armor Forge.
The Armor Station is the introductory armor crafting table. It can craft armor, repair, and replace parts, but it cannot modify the armor any further than its base form.
The Armor Forge is the upgraded Armor Station, giving the ability to finally modify the armor for greater potential.
